personalInfo.splInterest: Traveling, pool, watching moves and shows, hanging out with friends

tourBios.curYrHigh: Earned a spot on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada, finishing T10 at Q-School in January...In seven starts, made one cut, resulting in a T56 in his first event, the 68 Avianca Colombia Open in Bogota.

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Finished T148 at 2015 Web.com Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.curYearHigh: Earned a spot on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada, finishing T10 at Q-School in January...In seven starts, made one cut, resulting in a T56 in his first event, the 68 Avianca Colombia Open in Bogota.
tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Played in 10 Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada events, making three cuts, with his best outing a T31 at the Bayview Place Island Savings Open.

2012: Monday-qualified for the PGA TOUR's Reno-Tahoe Open. Made the cut and finished 67th in the modified Stableford format.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was a three-time first-team All-South Bay and four-time All-Bay League selection...In 2006, helped Mira Costa HS win the CIF title and in 2007 he won the CIF individual championship...At Loyola Marymount, finished with 25 top-20 finishes, including eight top fives. In his junior year, won the UC-Riverside-hosted Braveheart Classic...Won the 2011 Pasadena City Golf Championship after finishing runner-up in 2010.
tourBios.personal: Graduated from Mira Costa High School in Manhattan Beach, Calif. in 2008...Is the son of Sandy and Bret Sarnoff...Has one brother, Jordan...If not a professional golfer, would be a professional baseball player...First tee entrance song would be "Headlines" by Drake...Favorite golf memory was qualifying for the PGA TOUR's Reno-Tahoe Open in 2012...Favorite teams are Los Angeles Dodgers and Kings and favorite non-golfer athletes Kobe Bryant, Steph Curry and Odell Beckham, Jr...Other favorites include ZEN Golf (book), Kauai and Maui, Hawaii and Cabo, Mexico (vacation spots), Loyola Marymount and UCLA (college teams), Drake and Mumford and Sons (entertainers), Riviera, Torrey Pines-South and Pelican Hill (golf courses), "Happy Gilmore", "Let's Be Cops" and James Bond (movies) and "Seinfeld", "Homeland", "Breaking Bad", "70's Show" and "The Blacklist" (TV shows)...Always start his round with three tees in his pocket...Most famous persons met are Dennis Quaid, Doc Rivers and Sergio, all introduced by his golf coach, Eddie Merrins, at Bel Air CC in LA...Best sporting event attended was NLDS game four when Juan Uribe hit a two-run homer in the 8th inning and Dodgers advanced to NCLS...Would like to trade places with Derek Jeter for a day...Dream foursome would include Tiger Woods, Kobe Bryant and his dad...Bucket list includes skydiving, bungee jumping and sitting courtside...A unique personal feature are his green eyes...Twitter handle is @Jake_Sarnoff.

tourBios.curYrHigh: Earned a spot on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada, finishing T10 at Q-School in January...In seven starts, made one cut, resulting in a T56 in his first event, the 68 Avianca Colombia Open in Bogota.
tourBios.carHigh: 2012: Qualified for the Reno-Tahoe Open on the PGA TOUR and made the cut, finishing 67th.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won the University of California-Riverside Invitational while at Loyola Marymount. Finished his four-year college career with a 73.2 stroke average and 25 top-20 finishes in his four years, including eight top-fives...Won the Pasadena City Golf Championship in 2011.
tourBios.personal: Favorite course isTorrey Pines...Favorite profession team is Los Angeles Kings...Dream foursome would include Tiger Woods, Floyd Mayweather and Tom Brady.

tourBios.curYearHigh: Earned a spot on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada, finishing T10 at Q-School in January...In seven starts, made one cut, resulting in a T56 in his first event, the 68 Avianca Colombia Open in Bogota.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Latinoameri was T56th in 2015 at the 68 Avianca Colombia Open presentado por Arturo Calle.
